topic.title: Added README-ru.md file + new line in original readme.md
Where is locates private key for cloned site ?
topic.body:
I cloned blog with _clone_ button. Added some own content & when I push _**Sign & Publish new content**_ it asks my private key.
Where I can find this private key ?

1604066369_mirrored_RedbHawk_github.body: In **users.json**  file that locates in _ZeroBundle/ZeroNet/data_ first find your blog address & under that address you'll find **privatekey** (**not** **_auth_privatekey_**)
